title: VERY IMPORTANT FOR GP REWORK PART II @RIOT

replies.body: Ok, so that's why your name is red. I thought so but I saw someone else and they were only level 22 and I thought it was weird that a Riot worker wouldn't be max level... But idk... Hello!
That might be **Bob Llama** who is sitting right next to me in the office and is level 22.

Well I didn't mean anything by it, I'm sorry if you took offense. It'd be the same if I were talking to a CoD Ghost software designer and he were only prestige 6. I'm sorry if I offended either of you.

I am deeply offended and took out my anger by playing Teemo all weekend.

J/K no worries. Yeah, I am a low-level League player as my work doesn't actually involve the game itself and as the parent of a young child I have little time to play at home. I love playing, though, and consider myself a halfway decent ADCer... for level 23.
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO DONT KILL MY CRITPLANK I REFUSE TO PLAY THIS GAME IF YOU DO.
How does this kill Critplank ? His Ult doesn't scale with crits, ... but it would be so cool if it would O.o.

With a cooldown of 5 on GP's Parrley50/55/60/65/70 the mana cost should be less just look at  Karthus his lay waste cooldown is at 1s and cost 20/26/32/38/44 mana and GP's Remove Scurvy being at 65 I just never have the mana to use it when I need it the most if the cost was lowered it would be more helpful.
Karthus' Q is a skill shot, so it doesn't always hit.  All you have to do to hit Gangplank's Q is to click on the champ.
Just saying having a kraken for an ult so much cooler than a cannon barrage
